code: import{configureStore,combineReducers}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import AsyncStorage from'@react-native-async-storage/async-storage';import{persistReducer,persistStore}from'redux-persist';import settingsReducer from"./slices/settings";import quizReducer from"./slices/quiz";import statsReducer from"./slices/stats";var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:AsyncStorage};var reducers=combineReducers({settings:settingsReducer,quiz:quizReducer,stats:statsReducer});var persistReducers=persistReducer(persistConfig,reducers);export var store=configureStore({reducer:persistReducers,middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:false});}});export var persistor=persistStore(store);
